|rad1chip2 = |rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = |rad1rxchains = |rad1sstreams = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = |rad1g = |rad1b = |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is (or was) used by '''{{Used by service|Numericable}}''' - a French ISP. :[http://assistance.numericable.fr/IMG/pdf/guide_d_installation_netgear_adsl.pdf Installation guide] ::[http://assistance.numericable.fr/Presentation-modem-NETGEAR-XDSL-ADSL.html .. and some of the same in HTML] ==Links of Interest== [http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/VEVG2500_EN-FR-IT_DoC_18jun12.pdf Declaration of Conformity] (dated 2012-06-11)
[http://tools.netgear.com/environmental/NTGR%20CoC%20VEVG2500%20R1.pdf Certificate of Compliance] (dated 2012-06-19) :The product name is states as '''VDSL 11N INTEGRATED ACCESS DEVICE (V1H1>)'''. [http://kb.netgear.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/2649/~/open-source-code-for-programmers-%28gpl%29 This device has GPL code available on '''NETGEAR''''s site]. :[ftp://downloads.netgear.com/files/GPL/ On the '''NETGEAR''' FTP server] ::This is apparently a '''Westell''' router.. [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/vevg2500 On the '''OpenWrt Wiki''']
[http://www.netgear-forum.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=74476 On '''NETGEAR-Forum.com''' (FR)] :192.168.0.1 IP, 00:8E:F2 OUI [[Category:English Documentation]]
